body_html:
The same problem with ssd_mobilenet_v1_coco and ssd_mobilenet_v2_coco. I do not have any problem with faster_rcnn_inception_v2.

EDIT: Ok my solution was to set batch_size: 1 (line 141 of config file) instead of batch_size: 37 in ssd_mobilenet_v1_coco.config file or other config file.

I suppose that solution for this problem in the main post is to change batch_size = 32, to some smaller value. :)

EDIT: Ok my solution was to set batch_size: 1 (line 141 of config file) instead of batch_size: 37 in  ssd_mobilenet_v1_coco.config file or other config file.
I suppose that solution for this problem in the main post is to change batch_size = 32, to some smaller value. :)
body:
The same problem with ssd_mobilenet_v1_coco and ssd_mobilenet_v2_coco. I do not have any problem with faster_rcnn_inception_v2.

EDIT: Ok my solution was to set batch_size: 1 (line 141 of config file) instead of batch_size: 37 in  ssd_mobilenet_v1_coco.config file or other config file.

**I suppose that solution for this problem in the main post is to change batch_size = 32, to some smaller value. :)**
